title: A Kuramoto Model for the Bound State Aharonov-Bohm Effect
authors:
Alviu Rey Nasir, Jos\'e Lu\'is Da Silva, Jingle Magallanes, Herry
  Pribawanto Suryawan and Roshin Marielle Nasir-Britos
abstract:
Starting with the overall wave function expression for the electron in an
Aharonov-Bohm potential, we derive a version of the Kuramoto Model describing
the phase dynamics of the bound state of the quantum mechanical system.
